definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: Faldan could see that, in fact, the tree was full of small, hungry caterpillars.
sentences.chinese: 福達果真看到樹上爬滿了瘦小而飢餓的毛毛蟲。

sentences.english: The caterpillar will eventually metamorphose into a butterfly .
sentences.chinese: 毛毛蟲最終將蛻變成一隻蝴蝶。

sentences.english: They bite their way out of the caterpillar and begin spinning cocoons.
sentences.chinese: 然後它們會尋路衝破毛毛蟲體外開始做繭。

sentences.english: Before it is a caterpillar, and later, it perverts the.
sentences.chinese: 以前它還是一隻毛毛蟲，後來，它變態了。

sentences.english: During a three-month period, Rick entertained us by eating caterpillars during recess.
sentences.chinese: 曾經連着三個月，裏克在休息時喫毛毛蟲來取悅大家。

sentences.english: Should I feel revulsion at caterpillars?
sentences.chinese: 我是否應該厭惡毛毛蟲？

sentences.english: Morgan Stanley is a caterpillar in metamorphosis.
sentences.chinese: 摩根士丹利是一隻正在變形的毛毛蟲。

sentences.english: At the very beginning of his life, the caterpillar is yellow and black.
sentences.chinese: 出生時，毛毛蟲是黃黑相間的。

sentences.english: Researchers were interested in how fluids move around inside a caterpillar.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員很好奇毛毛蟲體內的流質究竟是如何運動的。

sentences.english: Out of the egg came a tiny and very hungry caterpillar.
sentences.chinese: 從卵殼裏鑽出一條又瘦又餓的毛毛蟲。

sentences.english: The Caterpillar was the first to speak.
Both butterflies and their fuzzy, pre-cocoon form, the caterpillar, are pretty darn cute.
sentences.chinese: 無論是蝴蝶還是羽化前毛乎乎的毛毛蟲都相當可愛。

sentences.english: T: look , the caterpillar became a big, fat caterpillar , becauseit 's eat lots of food .
sentences.chinese: 看，毛毛蟲變得又大又胖，因爲它吃了很多東西。

definition: weight/pendant/same as 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]/ballad singing accompanied by a 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]
(of fruit etc) fresh/(of a person etc) full of life/healthy-looking/(of eyes) moist and bright/lustrous
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, US comic book series, first appeared in 1984, also films, video games etc
